title: Queue Attempt to Join Failed Wait
body: This has happened three consecutive times in a row where I have joined a queue and than my screen go black after I accept. I am than forced to restart my game (client has not crashed or anything) and than I am forced to wait 13-20 minutes for this. I am not too sure if this is a bug or not but I have had to wait up to 40+ minutes for this.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
A few days ago I did
